General.Name: Dongsung FineTec Co. Ltd
General.Description: Dongsung FineTec Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of LNG cryogenic insulation products in South Korea. The company offers essential materials, including R-PUF and membranes; and insulation products and solutions for LNGC pipes, vessel insulation, and LPG carrier tanks. It also provides polyurethane systems, metal panels, containers, and refrigerants, as well as ultralow-temperature cold insulation materials. Dongsung FineTec Co., Ltd. was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Busan, South Korea.
